1.0.name: wordpress/einfache-tabelle
1.0.description:
This new Gallery plugin is easy to use and free of charge! You have different custom options within your WordPress

Menu and can also create as much images as you want. Plus there are different styles and Thumbnail sizes available where you can choose from.

Best Free Gallery is an easy to use WordPress gallery plugin that allows you to create and manage multiple image galleries through a simple admin interface.

Features include:

  • Enhanced social sharing capabilites for images

  • Newly added class name (best-free-gallery) for easy thumbnail styling

  • Upload unique thumbnail image and set custom dimensions

  • Include multiple galleries on a page/post

  • Set the 'sort order' of images in the galleries

  • WordPress ShortCodes for easy content integration

  • And much more...

Next features include:

  • Multiple image uploads to quickly popul
